page.title: 06THE DAIRY SHOP.
page.content: This shop closed 28 years ago.It was a butchers shop for many years,owned by a well_known local man,remembered by some of our older customers.We opened our dairy shop in this lovely 600 year old thatched cottage in East Meon one year ago.We are growing as a family concern all the time,and have a nice relationship with the public. We have a large milk round in the village and the surrounding countryside.We sell general groceries,fresh milk and cream,local made bread,home made scones and all kinds of fish,including fresh trout from the River Test,fresh fruit and vegetables and a good selection of ice_cream and sweets.
